items.title: Bryan Johnson spent $2 million to stay young, now he’s trying to not die at all
items.summary: Bryan Johnson, who spent $2 million on anti-ageing technology, is now looking to shut down or sell his startup Blueprint. Despite investing $25 million in the business, Johnson feels it may undercut his credibility as the founder of Don't Die.
